REMEMBERING JUSTICE ANTONIN SCALIA; Congressional Record Vol. 162, No. 27
FILLING THE SUPREME COURT VACANCY; Congressional Record Vol. 162, No. 27
NOMINATION OF ROBERT CALIFF; Congressional Record Vol. 162, No. 27
EXECUTIVE SESSION; Congressional Record Vol. 162, No. 27

congVote.dailyDigestSummary: <P/>Senate agreed to S. Res. 371, congratulating the Denver Broncos for winning Super Bowl 50.<P/>Senator Coons performed the traditional reading of Washington's Farewell Address.<P/>Senate resumed consideration of the nomination of Robert McKinnon Califf, of South Carolina, to be Commissioner of Food and Drugs, Department of Health and Human Services.<P/>During consideration of this nomination today, Senate also took the following action:<P/>By 80 yeas to 6 nays (Vote No. 24), Senate agreed to the motion to close further debate on the nomination.
